headline: ATLANTIS PARADISE ISLAND ANNOUNCES MARRIOTT BONVOY JOINS BATTLE 4 ATLANTIS AS TITLE SPONSOR
summary: Atlantis Paradise Island, the most remarkable destination resort in the world, announces Marriott Bonvoy, the award-winning travel program from Marriott International, has been named the Title Sponsor of Battle 4 Atlantis, one of college basketball's premier early-season tournaments. This partnership marks a major milestone for both the travel and sports industries, bringing together the excitement of college hoops and the allure of destination travel at the iconic Atlantis Paradise Island resor
